title: Reverse Search Query
description: This stage sends 'Content Documents' to the reverse-search collection to perform lookups on saved queries.

skip.title: Skip This Stage
skip.description: Set to true to skip this stage.

label.title: Label
label.description: A unique label for this stage.

condition.title: Condition
condition.description: Define a conditional script that must result in true or false. This can be used to determine if the stage should process or not.

collections.title: Reverse search collections
collections.description: Names of the reverse search collections with queries to perform the lookup.

topic.title: Topic name
topic.description: Name of the kafka topic to send the matching query ids. If left empty the results will be added to pipeline's context under the key 'reverse-search-lookup.result'.

timeout.title: Timeout [ms]
timeout.description: Time to await for the response from reverse search service

ignoreErrors.title: Ignore Errors
ignoreErrors.description: If true any failures of the stage will not cause the pipeline failures
